segments.text: What's wrong with the TV ? It isn't clear and the color's not right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . Maybe it's broken .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you do something about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll see if I can adjust it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's better , but it's still not quite right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why not tell the clerk and ask them to repair it .
segments.speaker: S2
